main event: A bright light with erratic movement was observed for 15 minutes southwest of Vichy, France on June 15, 1962.
interesting points: The object appeared to be at high altitude and would disappear and reappear.
The object moved on a 015 degree course.
The conclusion was that the sighting was 'unknown'.
The witness provided sketches showing the object's position in the sky.
The witness was asked to estimate the speed and distance of the object, but it is unclear if they were able to do so.
sighted object: a bright light with erratic movement
